title: Find the Differences Cars
description: In this game Find the Differences Cars you need to keep locate differences between the two pictures in the limited amount of time given to play each time! To play, use your mouse as control. Make sure that you don’t make a mistake more than three times because that will make you fail. One minute is the total time you will play through the 20 levels in this game! In each level you have seven differences. Good luck!
instructions: To find the differences in the car pictures use the mouse or touch the screen.

title: Cameraman vs Toilets Puzzle
description: Cameraman vs Toilets Puzzle is an exciting game in which you play as Cameraman's Agent, whose task is to destroy all the toilets with the heads of rainbow friends. You have to use your shooting skills to accurately hit each toilet bowl and avoid hitting a Nubian friend.
instructions: The goal of the game is to complete all levels. The goal of the level is to destroy all the toilets without killing yourself and the Nubian. Control - hold down the left mouse button / finger to aim; release the mouse button / finger to shoot. Destroy all the enemies by spending the minimum number of bullets.

title: Romantic Match Tactics
description: Romantic Match Tactics" invites you into a charming world where love meets strategy. Immerse yourself in an enchanting puzzle adventure as you strategically clear the grid, saving moves, and mastering the key to success – a delicate balance between item movement and unlocking the locked items. Progress through 48 levels, each unveiling new challenges as you align romantic trios to triumph.
instructions: Play effortlessly using your mouse or touch input. Move items with a tap or click, aligning three identical items for a trio. Unlock locked items by creating trios of magical keys. Strategically navigate around blocked tiles marked with crossed cupid arrow icons for thoughtful moves. Each level presents a challenge with limited moves, so plan wisely. Need an extra boost? Watch a rewarded ad video to gain 5 additional moves and enhance your romantic puzzle journey.

title: Traffic Run Puzzle
description: Traffic Run Puzzle is a popular car merge and racing simulator game. All Players can enjoy this game free online. Buy cars to merge, high-level cars can earn more money. Take it to the road to race, and watch out for other cars. Classic game-playing mode and car-driving content. Dear traffic cop, come to help them get through the intersection!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Number Collector: Brainteaser
description: Intelligent mind-breaker logic game. Train your logic and intelligence, Improve your math skills, IQ and memory, develop your mind and compare your best records on the online leaderboard. Use your brain to connect number blocks and get a required number. Think, count, remember, develop your mind and win! ★ Educational game. ★ For math lovers. ★ Game for kids and adults. ★ Leaderboard - compare your record in the players ranking top. ★ Colorful graphics and effects. ★ Simple control: use mouse for PC or touching/tapping on tablets and mobile phones. ★ Endless gameplay. Make your brain smart again!
instructions: The goal is to connect blocks with numbers that sum to a required number. You can only click on the neighboring blocks, creating a snake of numbers. Every 100 points, progress is saved. There are time bonuses and a solution hint.

title: Mathematical crossword

Also in this mode, after each completed crossword puzzle, the difficulty will gradually increase. - You can exit arcade mode at any time through the game menu and save your game.

title: FamilyNest: Tile Match Puzzle
description: Welcome to our addictive, relaxing, and free-to-play Tile Connect puzzle & pair matching game! As a classic pair matching puzzle inspired by Mahjong, Tile Connect is a popular strategy game in which you need to find the matching pairs of identical images and leave the board empty. Your goal is to connect all pairs and crush all tiles in the game field. If you are a matching game lover and looking for an excellent tile puzzle to exercise your thinking and memory, you will definitely be addicted to this FREE and newest Tile Connect mind puzzle! Tile Connect - Tile Match Game is well designed to develop your logical thinking and practice your tile craft for free. This will be the perfect time killer for you!
instructions: ?HOW TO PLAY? - Tap on the first tile to select it and look for another one with the same image. - Connect two same tiles with no more than 3 straight lines. - After the connection, the matching pairs of tiles will disappear from the puzzle board. - Match all tiles in pairs to clear the board and collect as many stars as you can! - Take advantage of hints when you get stuck and use shuffle to rearrange all tiles to build paths more easily.
